entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 1:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
